title: The Wilders
content: I am in the process of designing/printing a poster for a band called The Wilders. They're reminescent of a 1920
author: yolklick

comments.content:
thanks for quick response, Council looks like   
something i might want to emulate, I will   
probably have to hand carve the letters,   
sadly my budget for this is nil.

I think Larabie has some [free] cowboy fonts.   
   
hhp

Hrant thanks I was told not to make the poster look too cowboy though, more honky tonk than cowboy. here's one idea using a font from Larabie, not the most attractive face, maybe i should make it taller? whaddya think?

Wilders_test
wilders_test.swf (1.8 k)

Well, free fonts tend to be less good... :-/   
   
hhp

Emigre's [Brothers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419005959/http:/www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=83) and [Council](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419005959/http:/www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=86) come immediately to mind.
